Room.Name: Pirate Bay Entrance
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the waters at the entrance to a well secluded bay.
Room.LongDescription: The high cliff walls surrounding the pirate bay provide excellent protection for ships which drop anchor here. In past years, the private nature of the bay made it an ideal hiding place for ships wishing to avoid certain legal restrictions on trade. It is rumored that this bay was often used by the most feared of all pirates, Captain Morgan. This is the very bay where the Oceancrest Navy found Morgan one fateful and fatal night. There was a bloody battle, with no room to manuever for the pirates, and the Navy was able to sink Morgan's ship here.
